scripts.pull: rm -rf oras-artifacts && mkdir oras-artifacts && cd oras-artifacts && oras-pull ghcr.io/codbex/codbex-bw-migration/codbex-abap-bw:latest
scripts.transpile: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && abap_transpile abap_transpile.json
scripts.unit: npm run transpile && echo RUNNING && node dist/index.mjs && echo OK
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit
